import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function NewsWidget(_ref){let{symbol="NSE:RELIANCE"}=_ref;const[news,setNews]=useState([]);const symbolName=symbol.split(':')[1]||'RELIANCE';useEffect(()=>{// Simulate news based on symbol
const mockNews=[{time:'09:30 AM',headline:"".concat(symbolName," Q3 results show strong growth in revenue"),sentiment:'positive'},{time:'08:45 AM',headline:"Institutional buying increases in ".concat(symbolName),sentiment:'positive'},{time:'07:20 AM',headline:"Market analysts upgrade ".concat(symbolName," to BUY"),sentiment:'positive'}];setNews(mockNews);},[symbol,symbolName]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"widget news-widget",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"widget-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["\uD83D\uDCF0 ",symbolName," News"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"live-indicator",children:"Live"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"news-list",children:news.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"news-item ".concat(item.sentiment),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"news-time",children:item.time}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"news-headline",children:item.headline})]},index))})]});}
